movie.overview: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren take on one last terrifying case involving mysterious entities they must confront.
movie.tagline: The case that ended it all.
movie.title: The Conjuring: Last Rites

results.overview: 6-year-old and 10-year-old brothers decide to explore a dead serial killer's former homestead causing strange things to start happening over the next few days.
results.title: Mr. Happy

results.overview: directed by Faisal Hashmi
results.title: Faati Ne?

results.overview: After the end of the world, Damien and Emily are trying to find a salvation camp. However, after realising they are being followed by a horde of infected Screamers, they soon find themselves closer to danger than they'd like.
results.title: STATIC SCREAMERS

results.overview: Teenagers in a small town are dropping like flies, apparently in the grip of mass hysteria causing their suicides. A cop's daughter, Nancy Thompson, traces the cause to child molester Fred Krueger, who was burned alive by angry parents many years before. Krueger has now come back in the dreams of his killers' children, claiming their lives as his revenge. Nancy and her boyfriend, Glen, must devise a plan to lure the monster out of the realm of nightmares and into the real world...
results.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street

results.overview: Frank and Katrin return to Frankfurt to stop the scientist responsible for unleashing the plague of genetically mutated vermin upon the city.
results.title: Scratch: The New Sound of Terror

results.original_title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
results.overview: Six years after being presumed dead in a fire, and just as the town prepares to finally celebrate Halloween again, Michael Myers returns to Haddonfield to continue his reign of terror.
results.title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers

results.overview: While their couple is falling apart, Baptiste and Violette, two students, discover a new passion that may revive their relationship: murder. Yet, it is not sure that Gabriel and Madeleine, their Catholic and puritan friends, are going to approve this process...
results.title: Badineries

results.overview: A ghost walking tour group visits an abandoned radio station, inadvertently awakening a vengeful spirit.
results.title: Kishkindhapuri

results.overview: A group of youngsters get together for a fire to tell a collection of "Twisted Tales"
results.title: Twisted Tales

results.overview: Three tales of unbridled terror follow a couple vacation on a secluded island where strange forces are at work to keep them there; a young woman whose boyfriend is ill meets a handsome young man in the woods who seems to exhibit magical powers that can cure her sick friend, on the condition that she stay with him forever; and a family who move into a new apartment, unaware of a supernatural tragedy that occurred there.
results.title: Shake, Rattle & Roll V

results.overview: Bizarre nightmares plague Regan MacNeil four years after her possession and exorcism. Has the demon returned? And if so, can the combined faith and knowledge of a Vatican investigator and a research specialist free her from its grasp?
results.title: Exorcist II: The Heretic

results.overview: On the fifteenth anniversary of the exorcism that claimed Father Damien Karras' life, Police Lieutenant Kinderman's world is once again shattered when a boy is found decapitated and savagely crucified.
results.title: The Exorcist III

results.overview: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?
results.title: New Nightmare

results.overview: After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, Tom Witzky begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around her.
results.title: Stir of Echoes

results.overview: Dr. David Marrow invites three distinct individuals to the eerie and isolated Hill House to be subjects for a sleep disorder study. The unfortunate guests discover that Marrow is far more interested in the sinister mansion itself — and they soon see the true nature of its horror.
results.title: The Haunting

results.overview: Eloy de Palma is an exorcist pastor roaming the darkest corners of the country with his granddaughter Alba. Their mission is to help those possessed by The Evil One, an infection of the soul that is spreading fast. Each exorcism is tougher than the one before, and every battle reveals a piece of Alba’s forgotten past – an enigma that if unconcealed could change the world as we know it.
results.title: Asmodexia

results.overview: A twisted new tale of terror begins for a teenage girl and her family, and revealing more mysteries of the otherworldly realm, 'The Further'.
results.title: Insidious: Chapter 3

results.overview: In this H.P. Lovecraft adaptation, Carter, a grief-stricken young man, and his mentor Warren, an elder female professor of the occult, search for a portal to the underworld in an abandoned cemetery.
results.title: Carter

results.overview: A series of murders called 'the suicide syndrome' occurs everywhere at the same time and Phillip and Cheong-ha, who have been investigating the cases, disappear.
results.title: Evil Empire: Friday the 13th Chapter 2

results.overview: When the puzzle box is once again solved, Pinhead and his legion demolish all who dare oppose them. But standing in his way is the only person who has defeated Cenobites of the past.
results.title: Hellraiser: Hellseeker
